column4: This "update manager" isn't working....is the update server in Japan overloaded?  GRRR   I am not excited about an update manager that doesn't work.   Guess I'll have to figure out how to update it myself in the command line.
the command line version will use the same servers
if the repos are slow, there isn't a huge amount you can do - you can try changing to some other repos, but they wont necessarily be much quicker
